Rulings.Base: 1. The ATK gains are cumulative and last as long as this card is face-up on the field.\n2. If you destroy your own monster that your opponent controls, "Amazoness Trainee" gains 200 ATK.\n3. If you control both "Grave Protector" and "Amazoness Trainee" and you destroy a monster in battle with "Amazoness Trainee", you choose which effect to apply.

PSCT.Base: Monsters destroyed by battle with this card are returned to the bottom of the Deck instead of going to the GY. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: It gains 200 ATK.
